import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Container from '@material-ui/core/Container'; import { Grid } from "@material-ui/core"; import "../css/dashboard.css"; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { getData } from '../actions/dashboardActions'; const Dashboard = (props) => { const [list, setList] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { props.getData() }, []) useEffect(() => { console.log(props.list, "kumar") setList(props.list) }, [props.list]) const getPrice = (p) => { let value = parseFloat(p).toFixed(2) let Value = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-IN', { style: 'decimal', currency: 'INR' }).format(value) return Value; } return (

$93.65B
ASSETS
2,118

78

BTC DOM INDEX
45.4%
{list != undefined && list.map(res => )}
Rank Name Price Market Cap VWAP (24Hr) Supply Volume (24Hr) Change (24Hr)
{res.rank} Name ${getPrice(res.priceUsd)} ${getCap(res.marketCapUsd)} VWAP (24Hr) Supply Volume (24Hr) Change (24Hr)
) } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ list: state.list }) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ getData: () => dispatch(getData()) }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Dashboard);
